Package flounder.fonts

Contains classes for loading and rendering font texts.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    Simple data structure class holding information about a certain glyph in the font texture atlas.
    FlounderFonts
    A class that holds a list of available engine fonts and texts currently on the screen.
    FontRenderer
    A renderer capable of rendering fonts.
    FontType
    Represents a font type that can be used in any text.
    Line
    Represents a line of text during the loading of a text.
    MetaFile
    Provides functionality for getting the values from a font file.
    Text  
    TextBuilder  
    TextLoader  
    Word
    During the loading of a text this represents one word in the text.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TextAlign
    A enum that represents how the text will align.

Package flounder.fonts Description

Contains classes for loading and rendering font texts.
